      int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext, byte[] aKsn, short mTmkIdx, short mKeyIdx, byte[] mKeyDat, byte mAlgorithm, byte mUsage, byte[] mKvc)
      Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA, K_ALGORITHM_AES and K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT the key length MUST be 16 bytes; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;
      int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext, byte[] aKsn, short mTmkIdx, short mKeyIdx, byte[] mKeyDat, byte mAlgorithm, byte mUsage, byte[] mKvc, byte[] aTmkIv)
      Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA, K_ALGORITHM_AES, K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT and and K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT the key length MUST be 16 bytes; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES the key length should be 16, 24 or 32 bytes; derive key key of K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES depends on the key length.
      int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext, byte aDeriveKeyType, byte[] aKsn, short mTmkIdx, short mKeyIdx, byte[] mKeyDat, byte mAlgorithm, byte mUsage, byte[] mKvc, byte[] aTmkIv)
      Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA, K_ALGORITHM_AES, K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT and K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT the key length MUST be 16 bytes; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES the key length should be 16, 24 or 32 bytes; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;
      int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext, short aTmkIdx, short aKeyIdx, byte[] aKeyDat, byte[] aKvc, byte[] aSredMask)
      Key injection function for SRED.
      int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext, short mTmkIdx, short mKeyIdx, byte[] mKeyDat, byte mAlgorithm, byte mUsage, byte[] mKvc)
      key injection function; support algorithm: k_algorithm_tdea and k_algorithm_aes; set musage to k_usage_both for key used for both encryption and decryption; set musage to k_usage_mac for key used for mac calculation;
      int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext, short mTmkIdx, short mKeyIdx, byte[] mKeyDat, byte mAlgorithm, byte mUsage, byte[] mKvc, byte[] aTmkIv)
      Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA and K_ALGORITHM_AES; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;

      • cipher

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult cipher(android.content.Context aContext,
                                            short aKeyIdx,
                                            short aCipherMode,
                                            byte[] aInputData)
        Cipher function; if cipher mode is cbc mode, initial vector with 8 bytes (all zero values) is used;
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aCipherMode - cipher mode; encrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Encrypt; decrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Decrypt; cbc mode - aCipherMode | KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_CbcMode;
        aInputData - input data in multiple of 8
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • cipher

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult cipher(android.content.Context aContext,
                                            short aKeyIdx,
                                            short aCipherMode,
                                            byte[] aInputData,
                                            byte[] aIv)
        Cipher function
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aCipherMode - cipher mode; encrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Encrypt; decrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Decrypt; both - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_USAGE_BOTH; cbc mode - aCipherMode | KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_CbcMode; note: dukpt key supports encrypt ONLY
        aInputData - input data in multiple of 8
        aIv - initial vector; if cbc mode, use 8 bytes length
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • cipher

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult cipher(android.content.Context aContext,
                                            short aKeyIdx,
                                            short aCipherMode,
                                            byte[] aInputData,
                                            byte[] aIv,
                                            byte[] aInOutKsn)
        Cipher function with ksn (input and output) parameter
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aCipherMode - cipher mode; encrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Encrypt; decrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Decrypt; both - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_USAGE_BOTH; cbc mode - aCipherMode | KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_CbcMode; note: dukpt key supports encrypt ONLY
        aInputData - input data in multiple of 8
        aIv - initial vector; if cbc mode, use 8 bytes length
        aInOutKsn - input and output ksn buffer used for dukpt cipher mode K_USAGE_ENCRYPT; expect 10 bytes
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • dukptAesMac

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult dukptAesMac(android.content.Context aContext,
                                                 short aKeyIdx,
                                                 byte[] aInOutKsn,
                                                 byte aWorkingKeyType,
                                                 byte aWorkingKeyUsage,
                                                 byte[] aInputData)

      • dukptAesMac

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult dukptAesMac(android.content.Context aContext,
                                                 short aKeyIdx,
                                                 byte[] aInOutKsn,
                                                 byte aWorkingKeyType,
                                                 byte aWorkingKeyUsage,
                                                 byte[] aInputData,
                                                 byte[] aIv,
                                                 byte aMacMode)
        dukptaes mac function with ksn (input and output) parameter
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aInOutKsn - input and output ksn buffer used for dukptaes expect 12 bytes
        aWorkingKeyType - working key type - K_DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES128, K_DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES192, K_DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES256
        aWorkingKeyUsage - working key usage - K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_MACGENERATE, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_MACVERIFY, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_MACGENERATE|K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_MACVERIFY
        aInputData - input data in multiple of 16
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • dukptAesCipher

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult dukptAesCipher(android.content.Context aContext,
                                                    short aKeyIdx,
                                                    byte[] aInOutKsn,
                                                    short aCipherMode,
                                                    byte aWorkingKeyType,
                                                    byte aWorkingKeyUsage,
                                                    byte[] aInputData,
                                                    byte[] iv)
        dukptaes cipher function with ksn (input and output) parameter
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aInOutKsn - input and output ksn buffer used for dukptaes expect 12 bytes
        aWorkingKeyType - working key type - K_DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES128, K_DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES192, K_DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES256
        aWorkingKeyUsage - working key usage - K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_DATAENCRYPT, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_DATADECRYPT, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_DATAENCRYPT|K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_DATADECRYPT
        aInputData - input data in multiple of 16
        iv - input data for initial vector. For CBC mode it's a must
        aCipherMode - cipher mode; encrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Encrypt; cbc mode - aCipherMode | KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_CbcMode;
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • cipherDukpt

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult cipherDukpt(android.content.Context aContext,
                                                 short aKeyIdx,
                                                 byte[] aInOutKsn,
                                                 short aCipherMode,
                                                 byte[] aInputData)
        dukpt cipher function with ksn (input and output) parameter
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aInOutKsn - input and output ksn buffer used for dukpt cipher mode K_USAGE_ENCRYPT; expect 10 bytes
        aCipherMode - cipher mode; encrypt - KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_Encrypt; cbc mode - aCipherMode | KKeyDllController.CipherModeConstant.K_CbcMode;
        aInputData - input data in multiple of 8
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • epsReencrypt

        public KeyDllController.CipherResult epsReencrypt(android.content.Context aContext,
                                                  short aKeyIdx,
                                                  byte[] aInputEncryptedPinblock,
                                                  byte[] aNewIsn)
        EPS reencrypt pinblock by a new isn data; prerequisite: the usage of injected key associate with the key index (aKeyIdx) must be K_USAGE_BOTH
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aInputEncryptedPinblock - encrypted eps pinblock data with format Encrypt(1234IIIIIIPPPPPP, Key)
        aNewIsn - new isn byte array data; value range val = (1-999999); byte array = toByteArray( HexString(val) ); i.e., HexString(28581) = "28581"; toByteArray("28581") = 0x02 0x85 0x81
        Returns:
        CipherResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR; responseBytes: result byte array;

      • keyInject

        public int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext,
                     short mTmkIdx,
                     short mKeyIdx,
                     byte[] mKeyDat,
                     byte mAlgorithm,
                     byte mUsage,
                     byte[] mKvc)
        key injection function; support algorithm: k_algorithm_tdea and k_algorithm_aes; set musage to k_usage_both for key used for both encryption and decryption; set musage to k_usage_mac for key used for mac calculation;
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        mTmkIdx - input tmk idx in short type format; set -1 for tmk injection
        mKeyIdx - input key idx in short type format
        mKeyDat - input key data in byte array format
        mAlgorithm - input key cipher algorithm in byte format
        mUsage - input key usage in byte format - k_usage_tmk, k_usage_pin, k_usage_mac, k_usage_encrypt, k_usage_decrypt, k_usage_both
        mKvc - input kvc in byte array format
        Returns:
        activity_result_ok, activity_result_busy, activity_result_param_err, activity_result_key_not_injected, activity_result_invalid_kvc

      • keyInject

        public int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext,
                     short mTmkIdx,
                     short mKeyIdx,
                     byte[] mKeyDat,
                     byte mAlgorithm,
                     byte mUsage,
                     byte[] mKvc,
                     byte[] aTmkIv)
        Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA and K_ALGORITHM_AES; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        mTmkIdx - input tmk idx in short type format; set -1 for TMK injection
        mKeyIdx - input key idx in short type format
        mKeyDat - input key data in byte array format
        mAlgorithm - input key cipher algorithm in byte format
        mUsage - input key usage in byte format - K_USAGE_TMK, K_USAGE_PIN, K_USAGE_MAC, K_USAGE_ENCRYPT, K_USAGE_DECRYPT, K_USAGE_BOTH
        mKvc - input kvc in byte array format
        aTmkIv - input initial vector for tmk
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_KEY_NOT_INJECTED, ACTIVITY_RESULT_INVALID_KVC

      • keyInject

        public int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext,
                     byte[] aKsn,
                     short mTmkIdx,
                     short mKeyIdx,
                     byte[] mKeyDat,
                     byte mAlgorithm,
                     byte mUsage,
                     byte[] mKvc)
        Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA, K_ALGORITHM_AES and K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT the key length MUST be 16 bytes; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKsn - input ksn used for dukpt with 10 bytes data length
        mTmkIdx - input tmk idx in short type format; set -1 for TMK injection
        mKeyIdx - input key idx in short type format
        mKeyDat - input key data in byte array format
        mAlgorithm - input key cipher algorithm in byte format
        mUsage - input key usage in byte format - K_USAGE_TMK, K_USAGE_PIN, K_USAGE_MAC, K_USAGE_ENCRYPT, K_USAGE_DECRYPT, K_USAGE_BOTH
        mKvc - input kvc in byte array format
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_KEY_NOT_INJECTED, ACTIVITY_RESULT_INVALID_KVC

      • keyInject

        public int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext,
                     byte[] aKsn,
                     short mTmkIdx,
                     short mKeyIdx,
                     byte[] mKeyDat,
                     byte mAlgorithm,
                     byte mUsage,
                     byte[] mKvc,
                     byte[] aTmkIv)
        Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA, K_ALGORITHM_AES, K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT and and K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT the key length MUST be 16 bytes; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES the key length should be 16, 24 or 32 bytes; derive key key of K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES depends on the key length. For example, key length 16 bytes, derive key type = DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES128; key length 24 bytes, derive key type = DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES192; key length 32 bytes, derive key type = DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES256; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKsn - input ksn used for: a) dukpt with 10 bytes data length b) dukptaes with 12 bytes data length
        mTmkIdx - input tmk idx in short type format; set -1 for TMK injection
        mKeyIdx - input key idx in short type format
        mKeyDat - input key data in byte array format
        mAlgorithm - input key cipher algorithm in byte format
        mUsage - input key usage in byte format - K_USAGE_TMK, K_USAGE_PIN, K_USAGE_MAC, K_USAGE_ENCRYPT, K_USAGE_DECRYPT, K_USAGE_BOTH
        mKvc - input kvc in byte array format
        aTmkIv - input initial vector for tmk
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_KEY_NOT_INJECTED, ACTIVITY_RESULT_INVALID_KVC

      • keyInject

        public int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext,
                     short aTmkIdx,
                     short aKeyIdx,
                     byte[] aKeyDat,
                     byte[] aKvc,
                     byte[] aSredMask)
        Key injection function for SRED.
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aTmkIdx - input tmk idx in short type format; set -1 for TMK injection
        aKeyIdx - input key idx in short type format
        aKeyDat - input key data in byte array format
        aKvc - input kvc in byte array format
        aSredMask - input SRED mask data
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_KEY_NOT_INJECTED, ACTIVITY_RESULT_INVALID_KVC

      • keyInject

        public int keyInject(android.content.Context aContext,
                     byte aDeriveKeyType,
                     byte[] aKsn,
                     short mTmkIdx,
                     short mKeyIdx,
                     byte[] mKeyDat,
                     byte mAlgorithm,
                     byte mUsage,
                     byte[] mKvc,
                     byte[] aTmkIv)
        Key injection function; support algorithm: K_ALGORITHM_TDEA, K_ALGORITHM_AES, K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT and K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_DUKPT the key length MUST be 16 bytes; for algorithm K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES the key length should be 16, 24 or 32 bytes; set mUsage to K_USAGE_BOTH for key used for both encryption and decryption; set mUsage to K_USAGE_MAC for key used for mac calculation;
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aDeriveKeyType - derive key type used by dukptaes(K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES) ONLY; DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES128, DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES192, DUKPTAES_KEYTYPE_AES256
        aKsn - input ksn used for: a) dukpt with 10 bytes data length b) dukptaes with 12 bytes data length
        mTmkIdx - input tmk idx in short type format; set -1 for TMK injection; NOT SUPPORT for K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES
        mKeyIdx - input key idx in short type format
        mKeyDat - input key data in byte array format
        mAlgorithm - input key cipher algorithm in byte format
        mUsage - input key usage in byte format - K_USAGE_TMK, K_USAGE_PIN, K_USAGE_MAC, K_USAGE_ENCRYPT, K_USAGE_DECRYPT, K_USAGE_BOTH; For K_ALGORITHM_EXT_DUKPTAES case, input key usage in byte format - K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_PINBLKENCRYPT, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_PINBLKDECRYPT, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_MACVERIFY, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_DATAENCRYPT, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_DATADECRYPT, K_DUKPTAES_KEYUSAGE_MPP
        mKvc - input kvc in byte array format
        aTmkIv - input initial vector for tmk
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_KEY_NOT_INJECTED, ACTIVITY_RESULT_INVALID_KVC

      • keyLoad

        public int keyLoad(android.content.Context aContext,
                   short aEncryptedKeyBlockLength,
                   byte[] aKbData)
        Key load function
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aEncryptedKeyBlockLength - encrypted key block length
        aKbData - encrypted key block data
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR

        All key deletion function (corresponding caller id)
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        Returns:
        true if success; false if fail

                         short mKeyIdx)
        Key deletion function
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        mKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        Returns:
        true if success; false if fail

      • calcRetailMac

        public KeyDllController.RetailMacResult calcRetailMac(android.content.Context aContext,
                                                      short aKeyIdx,
                                                      byte[] aData)
        Calculate retail mac
        Parameters:
        aContext - input context
        aKeyIdx - key index in short type format
        aData - input data byte array
        Returns:
        RetailMacResult - resultCode: ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_OPERATION_ERR and ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK; responseBytes: result byte array;
